Â Â Â Â Â  the best thing about falling down the stairs is it's just a great way to describe a clumsy drum fill, also known as a drumsy clum fill

5.23.24  11:06 pm   what can you suggest for someone who is used to immediate feedback and is trying some long term goals where maybe that feedback isnt there every step of the way

Â Â Â Â Â  maybe start with a project that takes just 2 steps, where you don't get feedback after step 1, but you get it after the second step

Â Â Â Â Â  there are no questions to which the answer is no. the answer to every question is yes

Â Â Â Â Â i'm not ready for that yet

     also, side note, i often get confused between dutch and danish. i'm not sure why, but it's hard for me to remember which one goes with which country sometimes

Â Â Â Â Â that's ok. you can try either one, in either country. they will respond in perfect english
